long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows Google Plus™ users to bring back saved searches! The saved searches box will come up on the initial load, and when navigating to other streams, simply press the "Searches" button to bring back the searches box if desired. To save a search, type it in the input box and press enter. To remove a search, do the same thing.

Enjoy!


----------------------------

Known Bugs:
-The search button will show up on G+ pages that shouldn't have it.

If I get around to the bug, I will fix it.
